content.text:
# Gardens in the Republic of Ireland__disambig_1

List of gardens in Ireland open to the public:
*Achill Secret Garden, [http://www.achillsecretgarden.com/]
*Avondale House, [https://web.archive.org/web/20070629045954/http://www.heritageisland.com/Avondale%20House%20%26%20Forest%20Park.asp]
*Altamont Gardens, [https://web.archive.org/web/20070504105850/http://www.altamontgarden.com/]
*Bay Garden, [https://www.thebaygarden.com/] (Closed indefinitely as of 2022)
*Belvedere House and Gardens, [https://www.belvedere-house.ie/]
*Birr Castle, [https://www.birrcastle.com/]
*Camas Park, [http://www.discoverireland.ie/Arts-Culture-Heritage/camas-park-garden/76520]
*Coolaught Gardens, [https://coolaughtgardens.ie/]
*[https://www.coolwatergarden.com Coolwater Garden ]
*Dillon Garden, [https://www.dillongarden.com/] (Closed indefinitely as of 2022)
*Derreen Garden, [https://www.irelandseye.com/aarticles/travel/attractions/gardens/derreen.shtm]
*Emo Court, [https://emocourt.ie/]
*Fernhill House Hotel & Gardens, Clonakilty, Co. Cork [http://www.fernhillhousehotel.com/index.html]
*Fernhill Park and Gardens, Dublin, [http://www.dlrcoco.ie/en/parks-outdoors/fernhill-park-and-gardens]
*Glenveagh, [https://www.glenveaghnationalpark.ie/explore-experience/article-glenveagh-castle-gardens/]
*Glebe House and Gallery, [https://web.archive.org/web/20070402201433/http://www.heritageireland.ie/en/HistoricSites/North/GlebeHouseandGalleryTheDerekHillCollection/]
*Huntingbrook Gardens, [https://web.archive.org/web/20110925003251/http://www.huntingbrook.com/website/]
*Huntington Castle Gardens, [https://www.huntingtoncastle.com/]
*Ilnacullin (Garinish or Garnish Island)
*Irish National Botanic Gardens
*Irish National War Memorial Gardens
*Japanese Gardens, [http://www.irish-national-stud.ie/tourism.htm]
*John F. Kennedy Arboretum, [https://web.archive.org/web/20070622020445/http://www.heritageireland.ie/en/ParksandGardens/East/TheJohnFKennedyArboretumWexford/]
*Johnstown Castle, [http://www.wexfordweb.com/Johnstown/]
*June Blake's Garden, [http://www.juneblake.ie/]
*Kells Bay Gardens, [https://www.kellsgardens.ie/]
*Kilfane, [http://www.kilfane.com/]
*Kilmokea, [https://www.kilmokea.com/]
*Killruddery, [http://www.killruddery.com/]
*Kilmacurragh, [http://www.botanicgardens.ie/kilmac/kilmhome.htm]
*Knockpatrick Gardens, Foynes, Co. Limerick, [http://www.myinfo.ie/Knockpatrick-Gardens]
*Larchill, [http://www.discoverireland.ie/Arts-Culture-Heritage/larchill-gardens/1470]
*Lissadell, [https://web.archive.org/web/20070701101503/http://www.lissadellhouse.com/home.php]
*Lodge Park, Straffan, [http://www.ireland-guide.com/gardens/lodge-park-walled-gardens-.7101.html]
*Loftus Hall walled gardens, [https://www.loftushall.ie/]
*Mount Congreve Garden, [http://www.mountcongreve.com/gardenpage.html]
*Mount Usher Gardens, [https://www.mountushergardens.ie/]
*Muckross, [https://www.muckross-house.ie/house-garden.html]
*National Garden Exhibition Centre, [https://web.archive.org/web/20120614195630/http://www.gardenexhibition.ie/]
*Newtownbarry House Gardens, [http://www.newtownbarryhouse.com/housegardens/default.aspx]
*Oakfield Park, [https://www.discoverireland.ie/donegal/oakfield-park-gardens]
*Powerscourt Estate, [https://web.archive.org/web/20070618081859/http://www.powerscourt.ie/gardens/gardens/index.htm]
*Ram House Gardens, [http://www.ireland-guide.com/gardens/ram-house-gardens.7105.html]
*Rathmichael Lodge, [http://www.dublingardens.com/rathmichael_lodge.html]
*Talbot Gardens, Malahide, [http://www.gardensireland.com/the-talbot.html]
*Terra Nova Garden,
*Tombrick Garden, [http://www.discoverireland.ie/Arts-Culture-Heritage/tombrick-garden/76568]
See also

References
* The Hidden Gardens of Ireland, Marianne Heron, Gill and Macmillan, Dublin 1993
* ''O'Brien Guide to Irish Gardens'', Shirley lanigan, O'Brien press, Dublin, 2001
* The Gardens of Ireland, Jack Whaley, Poolbeg Press Limited, Dublin, 1990
* Houses, Castles and Gardens of Ireland,[http://www.gardensireland.com/main/map.html]
